sentences.en: At last my old governess came to me, with her usual assurance.
sentences.cn: 最后我的保姆又来找我, 仍然是很自信的样子.

sentences.en: Captain: This is your new governess, Fraulein Maria.
sentences.cn: 舰长: 这是你们的新家教, 芙瑞莉.玛丽亚.

sentences.en: I gave my governess a history of my travels; she liked the Harwich journey well enough.
sentences.cn: 我向我的老保姆讲述我旅行的经过, 她很喜欢哈立治那桩生意.

sentences.en: I'm afraid you don't look very much like a governess.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你也不怎么像家庭教师.

sentences.en: I'm from the convent. I'm the new governess, Captain.
sentences.cn: 我从修道院来, 是新来的家庭教师, 上校.

sentences.en: I'm sixteen years old and I don't need a governess.
sentences.cn: 十六岁.我不想要家庭教师.

sentences.en: Louisa: You mean you don't know anything about a governess?
sentences.cn: 露意莎: 你是说你一点儿也不懂有关当老师的事情?

sentences.en: My governess found me out a very creditable sort of man to manage it.
sentences.cn: 我们保姆替我找了一位很有名望的人来办这件事.

sentences.en: Now, this is your new governess, Fraulein Maria.
sentences.cn: 这位便是你们新的家庭教师, 玛丽亚小姐.

sentences.en: Readers and some critics were scandalised by the story of a young, plain governess who falls in love with her Byronic employer, unaware that he already has a mad wife incarcerated in the attic.
sentences.cn: 读者和一些评论家都对书中的故事感到震惊，在书中一个年轻、普通的女家庭教师爱上了她傲慢的雇主，却不知道他有一个疯妻子被关在阁楼里。

sentences.en: So the people of the manor lived peacefully, and Lizette’s governess taught her painting and piano and herbalism and manners, and her Grandfather taught her romping and riding and forestry.
sentences.cn: 于是人们在庄园里过着安静祥和的生活。 莉莎特的家庭女教师教她绘画、钢琴、草药和礼仪，祖父则教她玩耍、骑术以及森林学。

sentences.en: The 1847 Victorian novel "Jane Eyre," of course, tells the epic love story of a governess and her master, Edward Rochester.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道，这部1847年维多利亚时代的小说《简爱》讲述的是一个家庭教师和她的主人爱德华·罗彻斯特之间的爱情故事。

sentences.en: When she was eighteen, she went out a governess.
sentences.cn: 她在十八岁时外出担任家庭教师.

sentences.en: When she was eighteen, she went out as a governess.
sentences.cn: 她18岁时就去当家庭教师.

sentences.en: When she was eighteen, she went to work as a governess in a private house.
sentences.cn: 18岁时, 玛雅去了私人家里做家庭教师.

sentences.en: When they came there, my governess, who had her tale ready , kept her door shut.
sentences.cn: 当他们来到门前时, 我的保姆有一套随机应变的话, 把门关住不开.

sentences.en: You mean you don't know anything about being a governess?
sentences.cn: 你是说,你一点也不知道怎么当家庭教师 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 女家庭教师，女统治者，女总督，保姆
trans.tran_en: a female teacher in the past, who lived with a rich family and taught their children at home
